clusters.title: For some people, music doesn’t connect with any of the brain’s reward circuits

items.title: For some people, music doesn’t connect with any of the brain’s reward circuits

ai_summary: Certain individuals do not experience reward circuit activation when listening to music.

This phenomenon suggests a neurological difference in music processing.
Researchers are studying the specific brain regions involved in this condition.
The findings offer insights into the complexities of human auditory perception.
